title: Broward County Sheriff Ousted Over Handling of Parkland Shooting
text:
The Florida Senate voted to formally remove suspended Broward County SheriffScott Israel, whose department faced condemnation for its handling of the Parkland school shooting last year.

The 25-15 vote on Wednesday capped a lengthy dispute over whether he bore responsibility for deputies’ response to the attack at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School that left 17 people dead. Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis signed an executive order in January suspending Mr. Israel, a Democrat, accusing him of neglect of duty and incompetence.

...
description: The Florida Senate voted to formally remove suspended Broward County Sheriff Scott Israel, whose department faced condemnation for its handling of the Parkland school shooting last year.
